settings: manual control and various automatic settings (video modeburst shooting, etc.)
ISO: up to 3200 ISO with little noise
long_exposure: 30 seconds max, with bulb mode expose as long as you want

preset_modes: more  than 23 exposure modes (e.g. backlighting, fireworks, snow)
long_exposure: 30 seconds max, with bulb mode expose as long as you want

effects: 14 artistic effect modes (miniature, soft focus, skin softening, etc.)
